name: Space Maxwell
description:
Welcome to Space Maxwell,  a vaporwave-like space shooter!

Are you ready to handle the chaos? Your ship has two powerful laser weapons: the red laser and the blue laser. You must shoot the blue enemies with the blue laser, and the red enemies with the red laser.

Sounds simple? Well... shoot them wrong and they will multiply! And don't let them touch you, or you'll get hurt!

Experience the chaotic space shooter while enjoying an incredible vaporwave-aesthetic with sounds and graphics. Score high and put your name in the leaderboard.

Feel free to send us feedbacks, and have fun! :D

WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Please be careful before playing this game
